Angel Ascendant.name: Angel Ascendant
Angel Ascendant.flavor: You channel divine energy into a single attack that transforms you into an angelic being. Wings of radiant light spread from your back as your features transform into those of an angel.
Angel Ascendant.effect: You gain a fly speed of 6 (hover) that lasts until the end of the encounter.

Astral Wave.name: Astral Wave
Astral Wave.flavor: As your angelic visage emerges, a wave of astral energy emanates from your weapon and washes over your enemies with deadly effect.
Astral Wave.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage of the type you chose for your Astral Vibrance feature.

Angelic Presence.name: Angelic Presence
Angelic Presence.flavor: Your features blur into an angelâ€™s holy veil, and you are filled with a divine presence.
Angelic Presence.effect: Enemies take a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of the encounter or until you are bloodied.
